005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.format;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IAssemblyNodeItem;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IDocumentNodeItem;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFieldNodeItem;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IFlagNodeItem;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModelNodeItem;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IModuleNodeItem;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.INodeItem;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.item.node.IRootAssemblyNodeItem;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018
019import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
020
021/**
022 * An {@link IPathFormatter} that produces a Metapath expression for the path to
023 * a given {@link INodeItem}.
024 */
025public class MetapathFormatter implements IPathFormatter {
026
027  @Override
028  public @NonNull
029  String formatMetaschema(IModuleNodeItem metaschema) {
030    // this will result in a slash being generated using the join in the format
031    // method
032    return "";
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public String formatDocument(IDocumentNodeItem document) {
037    // this will result in a slash being generated using the join in the format
038    // method
039    return "";
040  }
041
042  @Override
043  public String formatRootAssembly(IRootAssemblyNodeItem root) {
044    return ObjectUtils.notNull(root.getQName().getLocalPart());
045  }
046
047  @Override
048  public String formatAssembly(IAssemblyNodeItem assembly) {
049    // TODO: does it make sense to use this for an intermediate that has no parent?
050    return formatModelPathSegment(assembly);
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public String formatAssembly(IAssemblyInstanceGroupedNodeItem assembly) {
055    // TODO: does it make sense to use this for an intermediate that has no parent?
056    return formatModelPathSegment(assembly);
057  }
058
059  @Override
060  public String formatField(IFieldNodeItem field) {
061    return formatModelPathSegment(field);
062  }
063
064  @Override
065  public String formatFlag(IFlagNodeItem flag) {
066    return "@" + flag.getQName();
067  }
068
069  @SuppressWarnings("null")
070  @NonNull
071  private static String formatModelPathSegment(@NonNull IModelNodeItem<?, ?> item) {
072    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(item.getQName().getLocalPart())
073        .append('[')
074        .append(item.getPosition())
075        .append(']');
076    return builder.toString();
077  }
078}
